name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Tech Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in developing scalable solutions utilizing **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, and **Docker**. Proficient in implementing **CI/CD** processes and managing both **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases to enhance application performance and reliability. Expertise in architectures encompassing microservices and event-driven systems, supported by hands-on experience with **Kafka**, **Flink**, **Kubernetes**, and **Google Cloud** services.

Demonstrated history of building high-performance applications for the healthcare and financial sectors, ensuring compliance with rigorous standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS. Capable of integrating observability practices and API-Security measures to safeguard applications. My background includes spearheading enterprise-grade projects that leverage advanced **AI/ML capabilities**, utilizing tools like MLflow and Kubeflow, and continuously optimizing workflows to drive operational efficiency.

• Engineered user interfaces leveraging **React** and **Next.js**, focusing on responsive design to improve user experience and engagement with healthcare and financial applications.
• Collaborated on Kafka-based asynchronous data processing, integrating **Flink** for real-time data handling and analytics within applications.

• Optimized data management strategies using both **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases to meet diverse data storage and retrieval needs while ensuring compliance with regulatory standards in the healthcare and finance sectors.
• Developed enterprise-level observability solutions to monitor application performance, diagnosing issues proactively to maintain service uptime above **99.9%**.
• Conducted thorough code reviews and implemented best practices for enhancing code quality and security compliance across all development phases, resulting in a **30%** decrease in post-release defects.

• Drove technology modernization efforts, transitioning legacy systems to microservices architectures using distributed systems principles, improving scalability and maintainability.

Established CI/CD pipelines on **Google Cloud** to streamline deployment processes, improving deployment frequency by **30%** while reducing rollback rates through enhanced observability measures.
Deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **Azure Machine Learning** and **scikit-learn**, achieving a fraud detection accuracy rate of **95%** by analyzing transaction patterns and user behavior.
Created and orchestrated machine learning pipelines for applications such as credit scoring and churn prediction, integrating them directly into backend services for real-time analytics and decision-making.

• Designed and optimized API endpoints with a focus on **API-Security** and authentication mechanisms, enhancing overall system reliability and performance metrics by **25%**.
